entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY ENDED, Kapuskasing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:04 AM EST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kapuskasing Airport 11:33 AM EST Sunday 01 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -4.1°C
Wind: SE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. POP 40%
